rules_text:
Reach
When EMIYA, Red Clad Archer enters or attacks you may search your library, graveyard or opponents graveyard for an Equipment card, reveal it, then you may pay mana equal to its mana value if you do create a token that is a copy of it then shuffle.
[i]Broken Phantasm –[/i] Sacrifice an equipment: EMIYA deals 1 damage to any creature.
